title: Darkest.of.Days.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Darkest.of.Days.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release Info:  

Year: 2009
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: 8Monkey Labs
Publisher: Phantom EFX
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language:Eng | Rus | Multi 7
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: SKIDROW



System Requirements:  

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or equivalent Athlon from
Memory: 1 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free hard drive space: 7 GB

Game Information:  

Darkest of Days is dedicated to the obvious, but somehow slightly used
shooters theme of time travel. The protagonist - Alexander Maurice soldiers
in the Civil War. During the bloody battle (not for unnamed bridge, and important
historical) he witnesses the amazing event: portal opens in the air, where
someone comes unexpectedly. In the heat of a firefight stranger manages
to push the main character in the spatial hole, but he dies.

Maurice is so in the future, where it appears that some organization engaged
in favorite business theorists of all time: impact on the present, changing the
key moments of the past. The corporation is not limited to the murder of individuals,
and erases the entire events of world history. It is with this organization will face
Maurice, who in the future, it appears a foregone conclusion found the whole
dynasty. So that his death was not in vain savior.

Game Features:  

Unique opportunity to participate in the most famous battles in world history:
the Roman Empire, American Conquest, American Civil War, WWI, WWII.
Play as different sides to keep the course of historical events - for "Southerners"
or "northerners" in German or Russian soldiers.

A huge arsenal of historically accurate weapons of different eras - the primer
gun during the Civil War in the United States, magazine rifles, "machine gun"
and sub-machine guns of the XX century.
Futuristic weapons corporation "Kronotek" - "smart" sniper rifles, raketomety,
shotguns and assault rifles.The ability to upgrade weapons for the points
earned during the passage of missions.A huge number of interactive
opponents and allies, you - not Rambo, you -the cannon fodder


Repack Features:  

Darkest of Days
Game Version - v1.05
Do not cut / recoded
